# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and goals. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
